snippet: Bill O’Brien, New England’s offensive coordinator, will succeed the fired Joe Paterno as the Nittany Lions’ coach, according to several media outlets.
abstract: New England Patriots offensive coordinator Bill O'Brien has reportedly agreed in principle to succeed Joe Paterno as Penn State's head football coach.
lead_paragraph: Bill O’Brien, New England’s offensive coordinator, will succeed the fired Joe Paterno as the Nittany Lions’ coach, according to several media outlets.

headline.seo: Penn State Reportedly Hires Patriots Assistant Bill O’Brien
headline.main: Penn State Is Said to Hire Patriots Assistant
headline.print_headline: Penn State Said to Hire Patriots Assistant
